summary: WHILE TRAVELING 10 MPH  AND WITHOUT ANY INDICATION TWO HALF INCH BOLTS HAD BROKE. DEALER HAS BEEN CONTACTED.   *AK   THE CONSUMER CROSSED OVER THE RAIL ROAD TRACKS WHEN THE STEERING WHEEL TURNED COMPLETELY AROUND WITHOUT CHANGING THE DIRECTION OF THE WHEELS.  THE BOLTS WHICH HELD THE RODS TO THE RACK AND PINION GEAR BOX HAD BROKEN INTO TWO PARTS.   *SCC   *SCC             *JB
